p: The primary endpoint of the STAT2 trial was the 12-month TFR rate after discontinuing nilotinib treatment; secondary endpoints were the 24-month TFR rate after discontinuing nilotinib treatment, the 3-year treatment-free survival, and the MR 4.5 rate and time to MR 4.5 achieved by nilotinib in the re-treatment phase. Safety profiles, especially vascular adverse events in the consolidation phase or symptoms related to TKI withdrawal syndrome in the TFR phase, were evaluated. Adverse events were assessed according to the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE) version 4.03.
